scripts.watch-js: npm run build-js && watch-run -p 'js/classes/*.js' 'js/functions/*.js' npm run build-js
scripts.watch-templates: npm run build-templates && watch-run -p 'templates/*.handlebars' npm run build-templates
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && watch-run -p 'scss/partials/*.scss' npm run build-css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js && npm run watch-templates && npm run watch-css
scripts.postinstall: npm run build-js & npm run build-templates & npm run build-css
